attributes.action: After 12 years of increased debt and job instability; real labour policies for labour voters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vote Labour, get Tory: vote Labour, get debt: vote Labour, get job insecurity: vote Labour get mp's who need a second home at no cost so they can get to work: vote Labour, get increased prescription charges': vote Labour, get war: vote Labour, pay for education: vote Labour, get rubbish social housing: vote Labour, get privatisation: vote Labour, get bailouts those who cause financial insecurity: vote Labour, get shafted.

ENOUGH IS ENOUGH IS ENOUGH...When we vote Labour, We want Labour policies for labour.
